{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airlink101 |model=AR670W |upc=658729081505 |asin=B001DBPV1I |fcc_date=04/09/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-N16 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=RRK-WRGN16 |ic_id=4833A-WRGN16 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2880;RT2880F, NH32930E0, 0816ST; |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29AL032D90TFI04 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V28S40CTP-G5 |ram1_num=2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 5-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600,8,N,1),, JP2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880;RT2880F, NH32930E0, 0816ST; |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C;IP175C LF, 0822S13, FPU8554.1; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt,OpenWrt (leitec) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1D:6A |oui_eth=00:1D:6A }} [http://www.airlink101.com/products/ar670w.php Product page]
[http://www.airlink101.com/download/download_links/m-ar670w.pdf Manual] OEM Alpha Networks WRG-N16 (8WRGN16A.2A1G / 8WRGN16A.3A1G) {{TechInfoDepot|Airlink_101_AR670W}} (numerous high-res internal shots) :[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=32995 Airlink 101 AR670W - Chip & Flash Details - DD-WRT forums] [https://openwrt.org/toh/airlink101/ar670w AR670W on the OpenWrt wiki] The sample SSID used in the manual is '''default670'''. The actual default SSID is '''default'''. The power adapter included with the device is a '''JENTEC''' AF1205-B (5V, 2A). ==Images== File:Airlink101 AR670W board top.jpg|board top [[Has images::internal| ]]
